sections.title: Layout of structs and tuples
sections.content:
**This page has been archived**

It did not actually reflect current layout guarantees and caused frequent confusion.

The old content can be accessed on GitHub.

paragraphs.ucg_layout_of_structs_and_tuples_p2: It did not actually reflect current layout guarantees and caused frequent confusion.
